entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `value` parameter considered in scope in `nameof()` in event accessor attribute #73733
  • Debug Assert error for __arglist (not handled in ref safety analysis) #73732
  • Compiler should allow calling a property's setter if it doesn't affect the structure itself #73731

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle nullability differences in duplicate interfaces #73730
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged

Merged

  • Avoid unnecessary array+linq allocs in common case #73727
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Use a common mechanism so Taggers access the main thread at the same time. #67259
    Area-IDE
  • Do not serialize ProjectId.DebugName (in release builds) #73710
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Modify (Large/Source)Text.ParseLineStart to specify an initial capacity for line count #73701
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal optimization #73650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Lower allocations in tagging #73729
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Avoid any sort of work converting from Span to TextSpan #73728
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cache options we compute during refactoring operations (option1) #73725
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All tagger work #73718
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Clean up Razor EA #73040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
